Text:
Fast download. can't comment on the 5.1 audio (only use headphones), video is 1080p resolution but has a lot of artifacts.
 Have only flicked through the video but the artifacts are in every scene, I'd imagine it would get incredibly annoying after a few minutes. Screenshot included for evidence (the artifacts move around so it draws your attention)

audio sounds great but yeah the video seems a little grainy like eddie_r said. not the 1080P i had in mind

im gonna try a different torrent
